subject: Question: RA Event Routes - Porting to AF

message.summary: Migrating TT to AF. Your raEventRoutes.js needs to be ported.
details: Your BE has requireRegionalAdmin middleware + permission checks
I need to understand the auth flow to port correctly
questions: Any gotchas in the RA permission system I should know about?
Is the JWT/Firebase auth token structure documented anywhere?
Any plans to change RA routes in BE I should be aware of?
message.my_plan: Create Events_RA.js in AF mirroring your raEventRoutes.js structure
